Text.Value: Honing skills? What do you mean?

I remember plenty - just not everything. I might not recall everything from my past, but I know my name. I can still walk and talk. I know words of devotion to Lady Shar and where to strike a leg in order to sever the main artery.

EditorData.NodeContext: 'don't worry about the details' Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: I don't know what to say... we're already together as much as Lady Shar allows. Is that not enough for you?

EditorData.NodeContext: Conflicted - involved with the player but sworn to her goddess. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: Don't you? It might be more interesting than you realise...

EditorData.NodeContext: Flirty. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: And making a lover wait...? Well, there's few finer torments, if you know what you're doing...

EditorData.NodeContext: Sly/knowing. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: I know you do... but I'm not going to let you. Not just yet...

EditorData.NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: As you mentioned Shar... is she truly going to prevent us from being together?
Is this where you tell me all about your former flames?
In all seriousness, I want to talk about us. Help me understand exactly what you and I have - and what we don't.
Don't worry. Even if I could remember them, none could withstand comparison to you.
I think I understand.
Pity.

EditorData.NodeContext: Cheeky. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: I don't know. What do we even have?
It's only a half-measure if you don't allow yourself to consider it otherwise.

EditorData.NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: About Shar... she isn't truly going to prevent us from being together, is she?
Perhaps not. This feels like a half-measure.
It can be difficult to explain, if you don't worship the Nightsinger yourself... but I'll try.

EditorData.NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: Imagine how much of a chore I'd be to have around if I truly remembered nothing.

EditorData.NodeContext: 'don't worry about the details' Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: Lady Shar's initiates... we weren't supposed to have relationships. Or flings. Not even stray trysts. And yet... we found a way.

EditorData.NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: Don't worry - I won't paw at you.
You can - if you understand how to reconcile certain... eccentricities in our relationship.

EditorData.NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: I can be very discreet. Shar won't know a thing.
What's that look you're giving me? I feel like a mouse cornered by a cat.

EditorData.NodeContext: Tiny hint of wariness. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: As long as my actions can be thought of as honouring Shar, or honing skills in her service... there is a great deal of flexibility to be had.

EditorData.NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: But you need to understand the limitations. I can't truly love you. Not like most define it. I'll always have to keep a place for Lady Shar.

EditorData.NodeContext: The serious bit - core issue that they face as a couple. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: How?
I really want to kiss you right now.
Good. Then hopefully you'll understand exactly what I mean...

EditorData.NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: You and me... it's an odd sort of love that we share. Help me understand it.
I don't want to feel like some teenager, sneaking around.
I'll give you all that I can. Just don't call it love.

EditorData.NodeContext: 'That's the deal. Hope you like it' Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: What's the catch?
The catch is this: I can't truly love you. Not like most define it. I'll always have to keep a place for Lady Shar.

EditorData.NodeContext: The serious bit - core issue that they face as a couple. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: Perhaps you do, but let's leave no doubt - I can't truly love you. Not like most define it. I'll always have to keep a place for Lady Shar.

EditorData.NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: You can frame many acts as service to the Dark Lady, if you put your mind to it. Seduction can be a worthy form of subterfuge. A snatched moment can practise the art of stealth.

EditorData.NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: But you're clever, willing, and flexible... you needn't feel left wanting.

EditorData.NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: Lady Shar respects cunning. And that's exactly what you and I will need to demonstrate, if you want this to continue.

EditorData.NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: You remember all of this?
Few finer torments.

EditorData.NodeContext: Leans in slightly and whispers. Callback to something she just said moments earlier about making a lover wait. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: Rules are perhaps not always meant to be broken, but they are always intended to be bent. That kiss we shared wasn't my first, you know. Far from it.

EditorData.NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: If I can be with you, it is.
Lady Shar's blessings be upon you.

EditorData.NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Text.Value: Well... let's just say I can play the innocent when needed, have a lighter touch than you might expect, and can untie many knots with just my mouth. Practical skills, learned in service of Lady Shar.

EditorData.NodeContext: Teasing. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

Synopsis:
Shadowheart and the player wrestle with the nature of their romance, when it has already been stated that Shadowheart must dedicate herself to Shar, leaving no room for others in her life. She helps the player to interpret this in a manner that may let them bend the rules. Heavy on the flirtation and innuendo, as if to defect from less-romantic implications of their relationship status.
Chronologically, this will occur after SH has committed to Shar by sacrificing Nightsong, but before the shar path sex scene that centres around a Nightfall ceremony.
